name: Spaghetti Carbonara
cookingMethod: Cook spaghetti until al dente. Meanwhile, saut√© pancetta until crispy. Beat eggs and parmesan cheese together. Drain spaghetti and add to pan with pancetta.

name: Chicken Tikka Masala
cookingMethod: Marinate chicken in yogurt and garam masala for at least 1 hour. Grill or broil chicken until cooked through. Heat tomato sauce in a separate pan.

name: Caesar Salad
cookingMethod: Tear lettuce into bite-sized pieces and toss with croutons and parmesan cheese. Drizzle with Caesar dressing and serve.Beat eggs and parmesan cheese together.
